Test Scenario: Search System Users by User Role
Test Cases Step:
1. Go to https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/ 
2. Click Menu Admin
3. Click Dropdown User Role 
4. Click one of user role
5. Click search
Expected Output: Success showing system users by user role
Result: showing system users list search by user role
